name: SE2-09 — VACHE SENTINEL
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Vache Island (Île aux Vaches Marines). A cow by name, a sentinel by duty.
Count the seven lights that never drink.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: seven-point star overlay; rope indicates bearing fork.
properties.clue:
A cow by name, a sentinel by duty.
Count the seven lights that never drink.
properties.visual_description: Bare granite islet; sentinel mood; seven faint stars above; skull watermark in foam; rope coil on rock.
